org.team5940.robot_core.modules.control.threads

Class IterativeThreadModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.team5940.robot_core.modules.control.threads.ThreadModule
        • org.team5940.robot_core.modules.control.threads.IterativeThreadModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Module

    public abstract class IterativeThreadModule
extends ThreadModule
    A reference, abstract implementation of ThreadModule that runs updates until interruption.
